content: two row below the first stitch on the row 4 ws sl1wyif ds p to 2 sts before last duplicated right needle and then knit into it with the st llip p1 turn right needle to make a new stitch llip use the tip of the left needle to pick up repeat row 3 & 4 another 3 4 more times the stitch two row below the first stitch on the right needle and then purl into it with for the final repeat of row 4 sl1wyif ds p5 llip the right needle to make a new stitch do not turn now working any duplicated sts as if just a rs/ws right side/wrong side single st p 8 10 p2tog turn st s stitch es heel flap row a rs sl1 k1 11 13 times sl1 ssk ds duplicate the stitch just slipped on the turn right needle by wrapping yarn over the needle on top of st if following st is a purl heel flap row b ws sl1 p 22 26 p2tog turn this is a complete yo if following is a knit it repeat heel flap row a & b another 13 15 more is half a yo to the back times then heel flap row a once more do not turn at bor beginning of round end of row 24 28 heel-side sts remain repeat repeat ankle & cuff rejoin with the instep sts and resume working in the round set up pattern k2 p1 k3 p1 11 13 times k2tog 48 56 sts continue in established 3x1 ribbing for 4 work k1 p1 ribbing for another 4 © 2023 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
